context: Industrial manufacturing facility, 800 employees, implementing IoT for predictive maintenance

request.purpose: Deploy IoT sensors and analytics platform for predictive maintenance across production equipment
request.justification: Unplanned downtime costs $2.4M annually, maintenance budget overspent by 35% last year

decision_process.outcome: Prioritized 150 critical assets for sensor deployment
Selected industrial IoT platform with edge computing capabilities
Projected 40% reduction in maintenance costs with 18-month payback
